name: A night with Natalie
description:
Tired of watching non-interactive porn clips which force you watch things from a fixed perspective? This simulation app is the answer to what you've always been asking for!

Natalie is here to fulfill your deepest desires and wildest fantasies. She has beautiful smooth skin, a perfect peachy ass, and boobs that you won't be able to take your eyes and hands off. She is a passionate and vivacious young woman with many talents, ready to make you the happiest man/woman in the world!

This simulator will provide you with sexual tease animations with hot audio voice to get your blood boiling with desire. You can follow that with some steamy love-making sessions with Natalie, which can be done in various positions. It's up to you to choose your favorite way to make love :) Alternatively, you can watch her getting pounded by someone else while you watch her and listen to her heavenly moans.

You can freely move the camera to observe things from any position you want. You can also use your mouse to interact with Natalie!
